data.name: Rabbit's Tale
data.detailed_description:
A calm peaceful village, burned and destroyed by an oppressive force.


Rabbit was born and raised in Carrot’s Village, a small, sunny town surrounded by forest, where habitants lived in harmony. Small town, great rabbits!

However, a threat grew each day, as a dark entity lurked closer and closer to Carrot’s Village. The Sovereign Entity discovered the power of steam machines, propelling them to power and conquest.



They threatened and took by force all the land they could, expanding their dominion thanks to their terrifying steam machines and cold-hearted minions.

One afternoon, they arrived at Carrot’s Village. A warning they gave, but a short one.

By dawn everything was sacked, burning and destroyed. Families were torn apart by kidnappers with no soul.

Now, our Hero finds himself alone with a mission on his hands.



Game Features


  • Metroidvania game: classic sidescrolling platform gameplay with an explorable, interconnected world.
  • Engage in skilled fights and immersive action.
  • Evolve new and powerful combat skills to fight your way through enemy waves and save Rabbit's family.
  • Fight the oppression and mysterious corrupted creatures.
  • Beautiful and intriguing landscapes.
  • Mesmerizing soundtrack.

data.short_description: The tale of a Rabbit that goes in search of his family after they were kidnapped by a sovereign entity that has an oppressive dominion over his world. But, along the way, something very mystical and dark happens to our hero.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core @ 2.00Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core @ 2.50Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
